ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.ShowDebugLogsHint: Turn this on for bug reports
ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.ShowRareCoinsName: Should rare coins be shown in the character sheet?
ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.ShowRareCoinsHint: Rare coins include Towers, Trines, and Saints
ARCHMAGE.CHARACTERFLAGS.initiativeAdvHin: Human racial feat to roll 2d20 for initiative and keep the higher roll.
ARCHMAGE.CHARACTERFLAGS.improvedIniative: General feat to increase initiative by +4.
ARCHMAGE.INCREMENTALS.featHint: Choose one feature as if you were the next level
ARCHMAGE.INCREMENTALS.hpHint: Increase your HP as if you were the next level
ARCHMAGE.INCREMENTALS.extraMagicItemHint: Carry an extra Magic Item without becoming overwhelmed by Quirks
ARCHMAGE.INCREMENTALS.powerSpellHint: Choose a power / spell as if you were the next level
ARCHMAGE.COINS.trinesHint: Beautiful Elven coins that meld gold, silver, and platinum. Usually worth 3 Standard Gold pieces.
ARCHMAGE.COINS.towersHint: Standard Dwarven Gold pieces - square with grooved edges, they stack perfectly with themselves.
ARCHMAGE.COINS.nupesHint: Standard Gold pieces from New Port
ARCHMAGE.COINS.saintsHint: Standard Gold pieces from Santa Cora
